pullRequest.title: Adjust pom generation to handle spec-first changes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds a pom task to the api sub-project, which does the following:

uses openapi generator maven plugin to generate code
uses dependencyManagement gradle plugin to include dependencyManagement in the pom.

Applies the spec version plugin to the API sub-project, so that the API version ends up with a proper version.
Updates generated pom.xml files.
To test:
./gradlew pom; mvn package

Without this change, the above fails; with it, it succeeds.
NOTE: While reviewing #2612, I encountered issues trying to verify that Maven builds are equivalent, and I found the need for this PR.
